00011 // Standard includes
00012 #include <ServiceControl/UserFriendlyAPI.h>

00015 using namespace std;

00017 using namespace Omiscid;

00020 namespace Omiscid {
00021
00028 class RegisterThread : public Thread
00029 {
00030 public:
00031     /* @brief Create a new thread that will register a thread
00032      * give its number
00033      */
00034     RegisterThread(unsigned int MyNumber);
00035
00036     /* @brief destructor (all destructor must be virtual !) */
00037     virtual ~RegisterThread();
00038
00039     /* @brief The Run procedure of the thread, so what he must do */
00040     void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE Run();
00041
00042     static AtomicCounter NbRegistered;
00043     static Event NewServiceIsRegistered;
00045 private:
00046     unsigned int Number;
00047 };
00048
00049 } // namespace Omiscid
00050
00051 // Implementation of static members of RegisterThread
00052 AtomicCounter RegisterThread::NbRegistered; /* A static value to count registered services */
00053 Event          RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered; /* A static value to count registered services */
00054
00055     /* @brief Create a new thread that will register a thread
00056      * give its number
00057      */
00058 RegisterThread::RegisterThread(unsigned int MyNumber)
00059 {
00060     // Set my Number and Start
00061     Number = MyNumber;
00062
00063     // Start
00064     StartThread();
00065 }
00066
00067 /* @brief destructor (all destructor must be virtual !) */
00068 RegisterThread::~RegisterThread()
00069 {
00070     // nothing to do, the thread destructor will call StopThread
00071 }
00072
00073 /* @brief The Run procedure of the thread, so what he must do */
00074 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE RegisterThread::Run()
00075 {
00076     // Ask to the service factory to create a Service. The service is not
00077     // register yet. We do not provide the service class, the default value 'Service'
00078     // will be used
00079     Omiscid::Service * pServ = ServiceFactory.Create( "RegisterThread" );
00080
00081     // If something tricky occurred, exit
00082     if ( pServ == NULL )
00083     {
00084         fprintf( stderr, "Could not register the service (my number is %d).\n", Number );
00085
00086         // Exit the thread
00087         return;
00088     }
00089
00090     // Just add a Variable of ConstantAccess that can not be modifies after the
00091     // service registration. Set its value to the number given in the constructor
00092     pServ->AddVariable( "Number", "interger", "My number", ConstantAccess );
00093     pServ->SetVariableValue( "Number", Number );
00094
00095     // Start the service, i.e. register it and run all processing threads
00096     pServ->Start();
00097
00098     // Say that there is one more RegisterThread Instance runnnig
00099     NbRegistered++;
00100     NewServiceIsRegistered.Signal();
00101
00102     // Wait for some to ask the thread to stop
00103     WaitForStop();
00104
00105     // Delete the constructed service and die (i.e existing the Run() function).
00106     delete pServ;
00107 }
00108
00109 /* @brief Usage function */
00110 void RegisterAndSearchUsage(char * ProgramName)
00111 {
00112     fprintf( stderr, "%s is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n", ProgramName );
00113     fprintf( stderr, "Usage: %s [-n <Number of services>] [-proxy]\n", ProgramName );
00114     fprintf( stderr, "Default option values:\n" );
00115     fprintf( stderr, "          -n <Number of services>: from 2 to 100 services. Default is 20.\n" );
00116     fprintf( stderr, "          -proxy: activated DnsSdProxy features to speedup reserach process.\n", ProgramName );
00117     fprintf( stderr, "                  Not activated by default.\n\n", ProgramName );
00118     exit(-1);
00119 }
00120
00121 /* @brief main program entry. No need to give parameter */
00122 int main(int argc, char*argv[] )
00123 {
00124     unsigned int i;
00125     int j;
00126
00127     // Constant values
00128     // The number of service to register
00129     unsigned int NumberOfServicesToRegister = 20;
00130
00131     // You can uncomment the following line to speedup searches
00132     DnsSdProxy * MyProxy = NULL;
00133     bool ProxyActivited  = false;
00134
00135     // A variable to store pointers on RegisterThread
00136     RegisterThread * pRegThread;
00137
00138     // parsing parameters, 0 is the program name
00139     for( j = 1 ; j < argc; j++ )
00140     {
00141         if ( argv[j][0] != '-' )
00142         {
00143             fprintf( stderr, "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00144             RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00145         }
00146
00147         // Do the user ask for help
00148         if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-h" ) == 0 ||
00149              strcmp( argv[j], "-help" ) == 0 ||
00150              strcmp( argv[j], "--help" ) == 0 )
00151         {
00152             RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00153         }
00154
00155         // Check the number of services
00156         if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-n" ) == 0 )
00157         {
00158             j++;
00159             if ( j >= argc )
00160             {
00161                 fprintf( stderr, "Missing parameter value for '%s' option. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j-1] );
00162                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00163             }
00164             if ( sscanf( argv[j], "%d", &NumberOfServicesToRegister ) != 1 )
00165             {
00166                 fprintf( stderr, "Bad parameter value '%s' for '%s' option. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j], argv[j-1] );
00167                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00168             }
00169             if ( NumberOfServicesToRegister < 2 || NumberOfServicesToRegister > 100 )
00170             {
00171                 fprintf( stderr, "You must set the number of service from 2 and to 100 maximum. See Usage:\n\n" );
00172                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00173             }
00174
00175             continue;
00176         }
00177
00178         if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-proxy" ) == 0 )
00179         {
00180             if ( ProxyActivited == false )
00181             {
00182                 MyProxy = new OMISCID_TLM DnsSdProxy;
00183                 ProxyActivited = true;
00184             }
00185             continue;
00186         }
00187
00188         fprintf( stderr, "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00189         RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00190     }
00191
00192     // A simple list to store RegisterThread objects
00193     SimpleList<RegisterThread*> ListOfRegisterThreads;
00194
00195     // Variables to Compute Statics
00196     unsigned int EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = 0;
00197
00198     // Print Welcome message
00199     printf( "This program is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n" );
00200     printf( "As it is ditributed, registering unique service and searching for services\n" );
00201     printf( "is a huge processing. See Accumulator/ClientAccumator examples for communication schema.\n\n" );
00202
00203     printf( "** Session parameters **\nDnsSdProxy is%s activated.\n", ProxyActivited ? "" : " not"  );
00204     printf( "Number of service to register %d\n** **\n\n", NumberOfServicesToRegister );
00205
00206 // Register services
00207     printf( "Start to register services.\n" );
00208
00209     // Create an object to now when the total time
00210     // To register the services
00211     ElapsedTime TimeCounter;
00212     for( i = 1; i <= NumberOfServicesToRegister; i++ )
00213     {
00214         // Create a new register service called
00215         pRegThread = new OMISCID_TLM RegisterThread(i);
00216         // if ok
00217         if ( pRegThread )
00218         {
00219             // add it to my list of threads
00220             ListOfRegisterThreads.Add( pRegThread );
00221         }
00222     }
00223
00224     // Get number of waited services
00225     EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements();
00226
00227     // Wait until all registered services are present
00228     printf( "Wait for service to be ready.\n" );
00229     for(;;)
00230     {
00231         // Wait for all create thread to register their service
00232         if ( (unsigned int)RegisterThread::NbRegistered == EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices )
00233         {
00234             break;
00235         }
00236
00237         // If not done, wait 100 ms macimum for a new service registration
00238         RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered.Wait(100);
00239     }
00240
00241     printf( "=> %d service(s) are registered in %u ms.\n", EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices, TimeCounter.Get() );
00242
00243 // Search for services, *can be done* in another process/computer over the network obvioulsly !
00244
00245     // First, in order to serach for service, we need to create a service event if it is
00246     // not register. This service will ne be visible.
00247     Service * Searcher = ServiceFactory.Create( "Searcher" );
00248
00249     if ( Searcher == NULL )
00250     {
00251         // print there is a problem
00252         fprintf( stderr, "Problem creating 'Searcher' service.\n" );
00253
00254         // Free all registred service
00255         // 1er way to walk among the SimpleList
00256         while( ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements() != 0 )
00257         {
00258             // Get and remove the first element in the list
00259             // and it can not be NULL, delete it
00260             delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00261
00262             exit(-1);
00263         }
00264     }
00265
00266 // First, search only one service named RegisterThread and get a ServiceProxy for it
00267     printf( "Search for single RegisterThread service.\n" );
00268
00269     // Reinit ElapsedTime object
00270     TimeCounter.Reset();
00271     // Search for a service, wait at max 5 s (5000 ms) to get an answer. We provide
00272     // A filter (automatically create by NameIs and automatically destroyed by FindService
00273     ServiceProxy * OneService = Searcher->FindService(NameIs("RegisterThread"), 5000);
00274
00275     if ( OneService != NULL )
00276     {
00277         printf( "=> service 'RegisterThread' found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00278
00279         // Delet
00280         delete OneService;
00281     }
00282     else
00283     {
00284         fprintf( stderr, "=> service 'RegisterThread' not found.\n" );
00285     }
00286
00287 // Now Search for all services named RegisterThread and get a ServiceProxyList for Them
00288     printf( "Search all services named RegisterThread.\n" );
00289
00290     // We need to a filters list, give a NameIs filter for each service
00291     ServiceFilterList ListOfFilters;
00292     for( i = 1; i <= EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices; i++ )
00293     {
00294         ListOfFilters.Add( NameIs("RegisterThread") );
00295     }
00296
00297     // Reset time counter
00298     TimeCounter.Reset();
00299     // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00300     // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00301     ServiceProxyList * MultipleServices = Searcher->FindServices( ListOfFilters /*, 0 = default */ );
00302
00303     // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00304     // an answer
00305     printf( "=> services found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00306
00307     // Delete answer
00308     delete MultipleServices;
00309
00310     // Empty the filter list to reset it
00311     ListOfFilters.Empty();
00312
00313 // Now Search for all services named RegisterThread with a pair number and get a ServiceProxyList for Them
00314     printf( "Search for all RegisterThread services with a pair number.\n" );
00315
00316     // We need to a filters list, give a NameIs filter for each service
00317     for( i = 2; i <= EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices; i += 2 )
00318     {
00319         ListOfFilters.Add( And(NameIs("RegisterThread"),HasVariable("Number",i)) );
00320     }
00321
00322     // Reset time counter
00323     TimeCounter.Reset();
00324     // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00325     // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00326     MultipleServices = Searcher->FindServices( ListOfFilters /*, 0 = default */ );
00327
00328     // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00329     // an answer
00330     printf( "=> services found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00331
00332     // Print information about found service
00333     for( MultipleServices->First(); MultipleServices->NotAtEnd(); MultipleServices->Next() )
00334     {
00335         // in order to write shorter lines below
00336         ServiceProxy * pProxy = MultipleServices->GetCurrent();
00337         cerr << pProxy->GetName() << " (" << pProxy->GetVariableValue("peerId") << ") is number "
00338              << pProxy->GetVariableValue("Number") << endl;
00339     }
00340
00341 // Now Search for specific service which is not a specific one
00342     MultipleServices->First();
00343     printf( "Search for single RegisterThread which is not %8.8x.\n", MultipleServices->GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() );
00344
00345     // Reset time counter
00346     TimeCounter.Reset();
00347     // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00348     // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00349     OneService = Searcher->FindService( Not(MultipleServices->GetCurrent()) );
00350
00351     // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00352     // an answer
00353     printf( "=> service %8.8x found in %u ms.\n", OneService->GetPeerId(), TimeCounter.Get() );
00354
00355     new char[2];
00356
00357     // Delete last ServiceProxy
00358     delete OneService;
00359
00360     // Delete answer
00361     delete MultipleServices;
00362
00363 // Unregister service and close all connections
00364     printf( "Unregister service and close all connections.\n" );
00365     // Reset time counter
00366     TimeCounter.Reset();
00367     // Delete registered thread
00368     while( ListOfRegisterThreads.IsNotEmpty() )
00369     {
00370         delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00371     }
00372     printf( "=> done in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00373
00374     // delete the Search service
00375     delete Searcher;
00376
00377     // delete the proxy is any
00378     if ( MyProxy != NULL )
00379     {
00380         delete MyProxy;
00381     }
00382
00383     // exit
00384     return 0;
00385 }
